short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share the current page, selected text, a screenshot and more to a webhook.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Parteux is a Chrome extension that allows you to share the current webpage with any service that supports webhooks. With a single click, you can send the URL, title, selected text, screenshot, and surrounding context to your favorite chat, issue tracker, or other tools.
